title: Three Legends Depart
author: VD
content_html:
Saban. Belichick. Carroll. All out in one single 24-hour period.

I doubt Belichick is done, but I expect the other two are. Great coaches, but also ruthless men; we’re not talking Bud Grant and Tom Landry here.

But regardless, it’s the end of a football era.

DISCUSS ON SG
